title: High Frequency Receiver (HFR) Field Waveform Samples in V/m (Selectable between the U, V and W Axes) - Craig Kletzing (University of Iowa)

parameters.name: HFRsamples_times
parameters.description: V/m displayed as very high resolution time-series. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function expand_wave_data (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['HFRsamples', 'Epoch', 'timeOffsets']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
